item.title: SOFTWARE ENGINEER, CONTENT TOOLS (san carlos)
item.description:
Aplia, a division of Cengage Learning, is an educational technology company that is revolutionizing how students learn. We create online, interactive learning solutions that increase student effort and engagement in their high school and college courses. We have helped 1,000,000 students at more than 900 institutions since product inception in 2002 and are looking for eager and like-minded individuals to join our brainy, creative, and lively group!

The Software Engineer, Content Tools is a key member of the team responsible for developing software tools for authoring and managing instructional content bound for Aplias web application platform. The products developed would be used by our team of over 70 content authors, reviewers, and editors as they develop content for a user base approaching 200,000 students.

Requirements:

 Bachelors degree in Computer Science or Engineering (Masters preferred)
 3+ years development experience with XML, XSLT, Xpath, and related technologies
 7+ years software development experience with Java and other languages
 Strong general database design and SQL skills (SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL)
 Knowledge of and/or interest in Flash, Actionscript, Flex, AIR

To view the entire job description and apply online, please go to: http://tbe.taleo.net/NA1/ats/careers/requisition.jsp?org=LEARNING&cws=1&rid=2265 (please click on the link or cut and paste entire URL onto new browser)
